tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ProteinValidationData (
    protein_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experimental_method VARCHAR(50),
    validation_score FLOAT,
    validation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE experimental_validation_data (
    experiment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    protein_id INT NOT NULL,
    validation_method VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    validation_date DATE,
    validation_result BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE experimental_validation_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    protein_id INT,
    experiment_type VARCHAR(255),
    validation_result VARCHAR(255),
    validation_date DATE
);
